entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 26 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. Temperature falling to minus 26 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 30.
